title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 145, subpt. 145-2 - Educational Requirements For Awards And Loans
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. I, pt. 145, subpt. 145-2

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§101, 202, 207, 210, 215, 305, 602, 661, 665, 666, 667-a, 669-a, 670; L. 1995, ch. 83, § 359; L. 2007, ch. 57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
